MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH46 postcode area of Dolphinton, affecting properties in Newmill Farmhouse and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.30pm. Our engineers have arrived the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:14PM on Sunday 14 March 2021.
